Text.Page:
You know, , they say nothing can stand up to you.

Maybe that's just barracks talk, though.

If you want to prove yourself, tackle a few {@LinkCreature:9#1410#labyrinthine stalkers}. That ought to be a challenge.

Sometimes barracks gossip is accurate after all, I suppose.

No one will criticize you from now on. Or at least they won't criticize your fighting spirit.

If you bring back the horns of the {@LinkCreature:9#1410#labyrinthine stalkers}, you'll prove the gossipers right.

And if you don't, you'll prove the skeptics right.
